Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an outstanding 82* off 53 balls to lead India to a thrilling 4-wicket win over Pakistan
Arshdeep Singh took the wickets of both Pakistan openers in the new ball phase
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Virat Kohli's innings, calling it 'one of India's best'
Virat Kohli expressed his emotions after the win, stating that it was a special moment
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Melbourne Cricket Ground in front of over 90,000 fans
India went into the final three overs needing 48 runs to win
Others: Pakistan scored 159/8 in their innings, with Iftikhar Ahmed and Shan Masood contributing significant runs
Hardik Pandya scored 40 off 37 balls for India
